text: Lal Kaji Gurung (also Lalkaji Gurung) is a Nepali politician and a member of the House of Representatives of the federal parliament of Nepal. He was elected under the proportional representation system from Nepali Congress filling the reserved seat for indigenous groups. In the shadow cabinet formed by Nepali Congress, he is a member of the Ministry of Federal Affairs and General Administration. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Nepali Congress politicians Category:21st-century Nepalese people Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Nepal)
title: Lal Kaji Gurung
